name: A+ Nail Salon Games & Designs Makeover Spa
name_original: A+ Nail Salon Games & Designs Makeover Spa
description:
It's time for an awesome and dazzling manicure girls!!

Now you can design and manicure your own fashion nails like never before! On this incredible nail salon game for your iPhone and iPad!

Candy paint your nails with the hottest and wildest styles and fashions!

Download now and indulge yourself and your nails with these great nail salon features:
~ Paint on the color of your dreams!
~ Choose from TONS of awesome patterns!
~ Use rhinestones, jewels, gems, stickers, and MORE!
~ Thousands of unique combinations to share with your friends!

Download Nail Salon right now and start making your nails beautiful!

Choose your nail color and then adjust your skin tone! Add sparkles or stripes! Then you can even bedazzle things up with gems and jewelry!

Download for FREE TODAY!!!
